Init.name: Init
Init.sender:
{
  state.current_energy_output = 0
  state.total_energy_output = 0
  state.rpm = 0

  state.scheduled_maintenance_interval = 20
  state.maintenance_cycles = 5
  state.maintenance_due = false

  next('Windy')
}

Windy.name: Windy

Running.name: Running

Maintenance.name: Maintenance
